sentences.sContent: In the competition between the megacity and the holy city, Upadhyay says, "Delhi is winning, of course.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the competition between the megacity and the holy city, Upadhyay says, "Delhi is winning, of course.
sentences.sCn: 大城市和圣城的的较量中，阿帕德海耶说：“当然是德里赢了。”

remMethod.val: mega(巨大的) + city(城市) → 大城市

trans.tranOther: a city with over 10 million inhabitants (
